title: Cottage cheese basil spread
directions: Add the cottage cheese, cream and mascarpone in a KitchenAid Diamond Blender and blend for about 30 seconds. Add in the basil leaves and the Olitalia Extra Virgin Olive Oil and blend for another minute. Transfer this mixture to a bowl.
Mix in the salt, pepper and the Olea Europea Sundried Tomatoes in Olive Oil. Spread about a tablespoon over toast, garnish with some chopped tomatoes and serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Olitalia Extra Virgin Olive Oil
3-4 Olea Europea Sundried Tomatoes in Olive Oil
